name: Mini Minos Labyrinth - Game Jam Version
name_original: Mini Minos Labyrinth - Game Jam Version
description: "Mini Minos Labyrinth" is a game jam game where you are trapped in King Minos' labyrinth and must level up to defeat the Minotaur. The game is focused on combat and features the fearsome bull demon that guards the maze. You must gather resources, weapons, and equipment to defeat the Minotaur and earn experience points to level up and gain new abilities. "Mini Minos Labyrinth" offers a challenging and action-packed gameplay experience where defeating the Minotaur is your ultimate goal.
